inclusion.criterion: study staff member will describe the study and offer participation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient agrees to participate, signs research protocol and HIPAA consent forms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: prenatal care and labor and delivery will be managed by her physician per standard of care
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient's prenatal care and labor and delivery will be managed by her physician per standard of care
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pregnant women undergoing primary or repeat cesarean section
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: maternal age greater than or equal to 18 years of age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: gestational age greater than or equal to 34 weeks
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: it's her first time getting the vaccine this year
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: she is married for 5 years and uses barrier methods of contraception
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of drug or alcohol abuse
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: maternal age less than 18 years of age
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a healthy woman with no underlying disease, who works in a rehab center and has no history of allergies to any food or drugs. She exercises regularly for 30 minutes a day at least 5 days a week.
